oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic piggery models for Finnish climate
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kivinen, Tapani
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The results consist of both combination and fattening piggeries. The small size combination piggeries are for 40 and 64 sows. The buildings are principally well insulated and heated during the wintertime.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kivinen, Tapani (2003) Organic piggery models for Finnish climate. Paper at: NJF's 22nd congress "Nordic agriculture in global perspective", Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
